src:
Gavrilović otišao u Španiju
Bivši igrač Partizana našao novi angažman

07 Nov 2019

Dinamik, Partizan, Borac Čačak – Breogan. Strahinja Gavrilović je pronašao novi angamžman u karijeri, prvi inostrani i karijeru će nastaviti u Španiji gde će nositi dres kluba iz Galicije.
Gavrilović je s Breoganom potpisao privremeni ugovor, ali na zvaničnom klupskom sajtu nije otkriveno na koji period.
On je tokom prošle polusezone igrao za čačanski Borac gde je beležio deset poena i četiri skoka po utakmici u KLS. Sezonu je započeo u Partizanu, ali je krajem decembra prošle godine raskinuo saradnju i otišao u Čačak.
text:
Gavrilovic went to Spain
Former Partizan player finds new engagement

07 Nov 2019

Dynamic, Partizan, Borac Cacak - Breogan. Strahinja Gavrilovic has found a new career commitment, the first foreign and will continue her career in Spain, where she will wear a club jersey from Galicia.
Gavrilovic signed a temporary contract with Breogan, but the official club site has not revealed for what period.
He played for Cacak Borac during last half season where he recorded ten points and four rebounds per game at KLS. He started the season in Partizan, but at the end of December last year he broke off his co-operation and went to Cacak.
